CONVERSION_FLAGS

Absolute Address:
Base Offset:
0xa
Size:
0x2
Source:
registers.rdl

Contents

Bits Identifier Access Reset Decoded Name
[15] PREVIOUS_CONVERSION_CORRUPTED r 0x0 -
[14:0] N_VALID_SAMPLES r 0x0 -

Field Descriptions

PREVIOUS_CONVERSION_CORRUPTED

If 1, means that the conversion settings were changed during the last conversion.

N_VALID_SAMPLES

The number of valid entries in ADC memory, from the last conversion. Again, this can only be 2^14.
